evidence.claim: Bridge uses AWS as part of its cloud infrastructure, indicating a reliance on scalable cloud services.
The platform adheres to HIPAA regulations, ensuring the protection of patient health information.
Bridge implements HL7 standards for interoperability with healthcare systems.
Bridge Interact leverages REST APIs to connect with EHRs effectively.
Real-time data updates are facilitated through Webhooks in their integration patterns.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
